results.headline: Leading Expert in VC/PE-Backed Oracle NetSuite ERP EPM CRM Ecosystem Projects—Implement, Optimize, SuiteScript Dev, ARM, CPQ, MFG & AI Engineering. Technical Solution Architect w/ CFO exp., CPA/CTO-ready. How can I help?
results.summary:
Since we cannot all be like Warren Buffet… the only way to stand out is to be truly remarkable!

Businesses are full of real people, with real strengths, weaknesses, and limitations. No one is good at everything, and people can do only so much with the finite resources available in their organizations. So it takes combined effort, purpose, and execution to achieve the dream.  

As a successful entrepreneurial-minded technologist with a strong background in accounting and finance, I collaborate with business teams to realize their goals... by linking data, knowledge, and insights to provide quality advice for decision-making, problem solving, strategic planning, and digital business transformation, with an emphasis on Oracle NetSuiteERP implementations, optimizations, and custom script deployments.

As both a big picture thinker and in-depth problem solver, I design solutions for a potential impact on scalable growth; while always advocating a “do more with less” bootstrap mindset. 

If I cannot be of service, I may know others that might meet your needs. After all creating and fostering relationships – and giving back – is a cornerstone of conducting business. 

Let's connect and make remarkable things happen!








Extensive experience in NetSuite ERP implementations and optimizations.
Custom SuiteScript development and software integrations expertise.
Hands-on experience with performance testing and tuning SQL statements.

raw_data.headline: Leading Expert in VC/PE-Backed Oracle NetSuite ERP EPM CRM Ecosystem Projects—Implement, Optimize, SuiteScript Dev, ARM, CPQ, MFG & AI Engineering. Technical Solution Architect w/ CFO exp., CPA/CTO-ready. How can I help?
raw_data.topSkills: Oracle NetSuite ERP • Technical Architecture • Financial Architecture • Custom Software Development • Enterprise Software
raw_data.about:
Since we cannot all be like Warren Buffet… the only way to stand out is to be truly remarkable!

Businesses are full of real people, with real strengths, weaknesses, and limitations. No one is good at everything, and people can do only so much with the finite resources available in their organizations. So it takes combined effort, purpose, and execution to achieve the dream.  

As a successful entrepreneurial-minded technologist with a strong background in accounting and finance, I collaborate with business teams to realize their goals... by linking data, knowledge, and insights to provide quality advice for decision-making, problem solving, strategic planning, and digital business transformation, with an emphasis on Oracle NetSuiteERP implementations, optimizations, and custom script deployments.

As both a big picture thinker and in-depth problem solver, I design solutions for a potential impact on scalable growth; while always advocating a “do more with less” bootstrap mindset. 

If I cannot be of service, I may know others that might meet your needs. After all creating and fostering relationships – and giving back – is a cornerstone of conducting business. 

Let's connect and make remarkable things happen!








Extensive experience in NetSuite ERP implementations and optimizations.
Custom SuiteScript development and software integrations expertise.
Hands-on experience with performance testing and tuning SQL statements.

experience.position: Techno-Functional Solution Architect | CFO Experience | NetSuite SuiteScript Dev | Managing Partner
experience.description:
Advising VC/PE-backed firms on complex Oracle NetSuite ERP and software ecosystem projects, delivering scalable, data-driven solutions across finance, operations, and technology.

• **ERP Implementations & Optimizations** – Full-cycle NetSuite deployments, process redesign, performance improvements, and module-specific optimizations across ARM, CPQ, MFG, SCM, WMS, NSB, and Cost Accounting.

• **Custom SuiteScript Development** – Designing and developing tailored workflows, scripts, and automation to enhance business processes and integrate seamlessly with existing systems.

• **Software Integrations & Ecosystem Architecture** – Connecting Oracle NetSuite ERP with a variety of third-party systems to create unified, scalable, end-to-end business solutions.

• **Techno-Functional Leadership** – Bridging business strategy and technical execution; aligning finance, manufacturing, supply-chain, and WMS modules with strategic objectives for measurable impact.

• **CFO Expertise** – Leveraging executive financial insight to ensure system architecture and ERP solutions deliver ROI, operational efficiency, and governance aligned with organizational goals.

• **White-Label Consulting** – Deliver complex ERP and NetSuite solutions through global expert teams, collaborating with Big Four, top tier accounting firms, and Oracle Alliance partners to deliver high-impact, behind-the-scenes results.

• **Project & Change Management** – Guiding teams through complex ERP implementations, optimization initiatives, and technology integrations with a focus on adoption, training, and long-term success.

experience.position: Solutions Architect | ERP Techno Functional Consultant | Software Development | NetSuite MFG CPQ SME
experience.description:
•	Act as a hands-on adviser conducting due diligence and helping define, shape, and execute client agendas for integrations, implementations, customizations, optimizations, and solution architecting other major strategic initiatives.

•	Tackle complex business challenges and solve them through business process improvements, and implementation of cloud-based SaaS solutions, such as CRM or ERP applications to automate key business functions. 

•	Deploy and customize added ERP solution modules (OneWorld, ARM, CRM, WMS, SRP, Supply Chain, eCommerce, Manufacturing). 

•	Use data, analytics, insight, and business requirement building (BRD) to identify functional gaps, and to design, build, sandbox, and operate omni-channel experiences and platforms. 

•	Enable clients with multiple subsidiaries, foreign exchange challenges, and multi-book reporting needs, to generate accurate balance sheets, reports, analytics, audit trails, and financial statements that comply with GAAP or IFRS standards.

•	Special focus on ASC 606 transition projects, working directly with technical leads & CFO’s to design, implement, verify, & transition clients to the new advanced revenue recognition accounting standards and disclosures using best practice methodology.

•	Ensure WMS & SCM service goals for complex multi-location inventory by defining warehouse rules (bin tracking, cycle counting, zones, order picking, returns, etc.) and integration of advanced shipping functionality, EDI, and mobile RF barcode scanning devices. 

•	Provide expert training, support, product demonstration, and knowledge transfer by preparing meeting communications, conferences, and presentations.

•	Client work includes major brands in pharmaceuticals, manufacturing, e-commerce, telecom, software, consumer products, hospitality, media, tech, health & wellness, leisure, agriculture, sporting goods, services, retail, education, wholesale distribution, insurance, construction, luxury, startups. Sparta Trackwise

experience.position: Oracle NetSuite Subject Matter Expert - CPQ | Configure Price Quote | Technical Architect
experience.description:
Oracle NetSuite Subject Matter Expert - CPQ | Configure Price Quote | QTC
Lead Solutions Architect and Software Engineer on some of the most complex Oracle NetSuite CPQ projects. Not only using native out of the box features, but customizing and enhancing the software to achieve a CPQ experience that becomes a true return on investment for the users.
In addition, we enhanced the proposal feature to enable quick turn around of opportunities and quotes increasing the likelihood of closing deals.
On the manufacturing side, we use our advanced manufacturing expertise and WMS experience to build dynamic BOM's (bill of materials) and Routings, and blending the CPQ process directly in the assembly build.
Custom scripting in SuiteScript, JSON, Javascript, Angular, HTML etc... Whatever it takes to deliver the most outstanding configuration experience. Smartsheet. Microsoft Visio, PowerPoint, Word, and SharePoint. Azure, Service Bus, and API-based enterprise architecture. Experience working in a startup or fast-scaling technology environment. Experience designing AI or data automation solutions for financial operations, auditing, or compliance. Knowledge of reporting and dashboard tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau). SuiteSuccess, ERP data migration and cutover experience, Software development life-cycles (SDLC), Developing and optimizing NetSuite SuiteTalk, SOAP integrations, or REST integrations, Orchestrating and executing load and performance testing, Tuning of SQL statements, ODBC / JDBC data extraction strategy ,design and tuning, Data Modeling, Oracle database architecture, Architecting and tuning integrations (with products like Oracle Data Integrator, Boomi, Mulesoft, Celigo, Workato or Snaplogic), ETL tools and techniques, ETL (Extract, Transform, Load), ELT (Extract, Load, Transform), data integration, data transformation,

experience.position: Oracle NetSuite Subject Matter Expert - Advanced Manufacturing and MRP Demand Planning
experience.description:
Manufacturing
•	Drive manufacturing excellence through the integration of advanced manufacturing workflows, process logging, work orders, BOMs, WIPs, demand planning, scheduling, serial & lot control, RCCP, resource allocation, batch processing and quality assurance. An understanding of additional quality management workflows to meet regulatory and internal quality expectations. Familiar with quality roles, quality process flows, customizing quality management workflows, quality inspection queue triggers (quarantined, return to vendor), quality custom inspection rules (expected input/output) etc. Delivering the scalable foundation for high-growth in supply chain and manufacturing. 


Design to Build, Procure to Pay, Return to Debit, Planning & Inventory Management, Plan to Produce, Demand Planning, Build to Fulfill, Quarantine, Bins, Transfer Orders, Inventory Adjustments, Cycle Counting, Wireless Scanning, Bar Codes, Inventory Reporting, Make to Stock, Make to Order, Work Order Generation, Component Availability, Review Capacity, Schedule Production, Demand Fulfillment, Assembly Item Records, Assembly Work Orders, Advanced Bill of Materials. Engineering Change Order ECO ECR ECN MCO Process Flow, SIPOC, Parity Factory, Fishbowl, private label, co-packing and contract manufacturing,  CPG Manufacturing, Private Label, co-packing and contract manufacturing, synchronize data , suitesync, stripe connector,

Seamless integration of Project Management and Business Process: Advanced Projects Management, Global Business Management & Financial Consolidation, Advanced Revenue Recognition, Multi-Subsidiary & Multi-Currency Environments, Accurate & Efficient Billing and Invoicing, Financials, Analytics, Client Management, Project Managment, Resource Management, Time and Expense, Mobile, Product Sales, Real Time Resource Visibility, Consolidated Time Tracking, Rules Based Automated Billing, Manage Performance, Monitor KPI's in Real Time, Project Dashboards, Robust Gantt charts, Time Sheets, Expense Reports, Customer Center, Project Forecasted Charges, Sub Contractors, Resource Capacity, Task Allocations, Skillset Score, Resource Allocation, Subscription Billing, Recurring Billing, Time-Based Billing, Time and Materials, Profitability Snapshots, Project Reporting, Navigation Portlet, Project Summary, Project Templates, Audit Trail, Change Orders, Labor Cost, Milestones, Skills & Expertise, PM Project Manager, Project Scheduler, Project Budget, Predecessors, Project Completion, Holistic technical design reviews, Performance and scalability, Optimization of integrations and NetSuite customizations, Data management consultation and guidance, Consultative guidance on ERP leading practices, NetSuite Technical Architect, Orchestrating and executing load and performance testing

experience.position: Oracle NetSuite Consultant - Client Liason - Customer Success & Customization
experience.description:
Over two decades acting as a project manager, ERP consultant, solutions architect, client liaison, trainer, trouble shooter, and strategy & transformation advisor to various organizations in multiple industries (including many running Oracle NetSuite and Salesforce.com). Assisted in the design of proposed solutions, and served as a strategic partner during planning, evaluation and implementation, as well as participating in the UAT, Cutover & Go-Live phases of many projects.

Methodology 
•	Well versed in the NetSuite SuiteSuccess implementation methodology and collaborative approach (Initiate, Analyze, Configure, Deploy, Optimize) and a champion of Agile to inspire change and continuous improvement throughout the delivery process. Work directly with and serve as the liaison between business units, technology teams, support and external vendors.

Customization 
•	Analyze business requirements and decide on business solutions. Optimization of system including upgrades, and customization of dashboards (lists, records, fields, forms, centers, tabs) and UAT with the use of a Sandbox. As well as designing process improvements using Suiteflow, SuiteScripts, Templates, Process Work Flows, Saved Searches, Custom Fields, Exception Reports, Real-Time Reports and Queries, G/L Design, XML Templates, and API level automation. Use of dashboards for KPI reporting and milestones. To address NetSuite system limitations, the need to use third-party partner integration plugins is sometimes needed. Oversee development on the SuiteCloud Development Framework SDF.

Knowledge Transfer
•	Provided ongoing implementation support, training, oversight and functional guidance to NetSuite system administrators for design, system architecture, and business processes to realize industry best practices.

Order to Cash, Lead to Quote, Record to Report, Call to Resolution, Marketing to ROI,

experience.position: Oracle NetSuite Consultant - FRM Financial Resource Management (Accounting & Finance) NS EPM
experience.description:
Accounting 
•	Extensive ERP and accounting experience, providing localized solutions with the use of NetSuite One World and Multi-Books and XML templates which are essential for reporting primary and statutory requirements.  Drive improvements related to Record to Report, Order to Cash, Procure to Pay, Content Accounting, Tax, and Treasury.

GAAP & IFRS Compliance
•	Advised multiple clients on the transition to the new accounting standards (ASC 606) and the implementation of the NetSuite ARM (Advanced Revenue Management module), ensuring the compliance and on time reporting of revenue forecasting, allocation, recognition, and reclassification. 

Finance
•	Andrew’s P&L and CFO experience brings credibility and commercial grounding, to any NetSuite financial module implementation. His exposure to venture capital and private equity backed businesses, who demand accurate financial statements and accountability for funding, helped refine his expertise in financial reporting, modeling, planning, budgeting, and boardroom presentations. Exposure to many additional NetSuite financial modules such as: Advanced Subscription Billing, Fixed Assets Management, Taxation, or PBCS Planning Budgeting Cloud Service (think Adaptive Insights EPM). ExtendTech, NetSuite Contractor, NetSuite Freelancer, NetSuite Solution 7 Financial Reporting, Cost Accountant, NetSuite Costing Method, Standard Costing, Support audit preparation and compliance requirements, SAP S/4HANA and MS Business Central,

experience.position: Oracle NetSuite Consultant - SME - Supply Chain and Warehouse Management Systems
experience.description:
Supply Chain Management and Warehouse Management Systems
•	Ensured SCM & WMS service goals for complex multi-location inventory by defining warehouse rules (bin tracking, cycle counting, zones, picking, returns, FIFO, etc.) and integration of advanced shipping functionality, EDI, and mobile RF barcode scanning devices. Use of supply chain solutions for advanced planning and scheduling, procurement, manufacturing and warehouse management processes, as well as for engineer-to-pay, order-to-cash and plan-to-build business cycles. Have dealt with consignment stock, procurement of perishables, and inbound stock. Well versed in cash drawer, mobile certificates, pick face locations, containers, inbound trailers, license plates, zones, bins, order types, carrier service levels, put away strategies, shipping integration, and supply chain architecture. CPIM.

•	Warehouse management systems that give companies across industries a foundation of best practices for receiving, put-away/flow-through, inventory management, order processing, replenishment, pick/pack, loading and shipping, as well as the ability to build their own company-specific businesses processes using adaptability tools.

Focus on core business and not have to manage IT. RF Smart, HighJump, Accellos One Warehouse, 3PL Third Party Logistics, Cubing, Cartonization, Cluster Pick Process, Picking Wave, Batch Picking, Rules Based Processes, Dashboard Analytics, Real Time Inventory Visibility, Inventory Replenishment, EDI/ASN, Increase Order Accuracy, Optimize Labor, Pacejet, Descartes Fleet Management, Tracktrace RX, Valogix, Verenia, Dispatch Tack, AMC Eclipse, RFSmart, LP Nesting, NetSuite Trimble Navigation, OzLink, Honeywell Scanners, Validate Script, License Plates, Magaya, NetSuite Pack Station, GS1 Barcode Scanning, Pharma, Reverse Distribution, Blind Receipts, RX Reverse Services, RxRs, Pharma Logistics, Parity Factory, ParityFactory, Workato, CouchDB, Trimble TMS, Modus, PBCS, Famous Software, SuiteSQ,

experience.position: Oracle NetSuite Consultant - CRM and Omni Channel Commerce
experience.description:
CRM
•	Use Salesforce.com expertise to integrate and optimize NetSuite CRM into a seamless flow of information across the entire customer lifecycle. Sales force automation and opportunity management, customer service management (case mgmt.), marketing automation, and partner relationship management, as well as helping drive business performance with the use of the NetSuite app on mobile devices. NetSuite CRM can also offer a complete omnichannel sales enablement and productivity suite offering front office, configure, price, quote (CPQ), and ecommerce solutions. 

Omni Channel Commerce
•	Omnichannel expertise to make the consumer the focal point of the business. A strong aptitude for customer UX and design, and demonstrated experience on websites and mobile applications. Helped customers bring their eCommerce solutions to life with the implementation of NetSuite SuiteCommerce. Creating consistent and personalized shopping and service experiences for every customer in-store and on any device. Centrally managing orders from multiple channels and fulfilling from any source to enable buy and get anywhere experiences (In Store or Web Store). Exposure to Grid Order Management layouts, Point of Sale Administration, Site Management Tools, Store Front, Themes and Extensions, Site Builder, Matrix Items, Kits, Assemblies, and special expertise in SEO and website Analytics, to help deliver strategies for organic user growth. Well versed in SFRA, mobile first design practices.

Other eCommerce Platforms
•	Help clients who opt out of using NetSuite SuiteCommerce for their online commerce, because they want to keep their existing ecommerce front-end platforms such as SuiteCommerce, Magento, Shopify, BigCommerce, Amazon, or even proprietary custom-made CMS systems. Able to connect these systems to NetSuite ERP, with the use of connectors such as Dell Boomi, FarApp, Celigo, etc. This step becomes an integral part of the implementation process.
Fixed Assets Acquire to Retire HighJump

experience.position: Oracle NetSuite Technical Architect | PSA / SuiteProjects Advanced
experience.description:
PSA+ is NetSuite’s advanced layer on top of SuiteProjects (the native PSA tool). Adds automation, intelligence, and predictive resource/financial capabilities that are not available in core PSA.
Think of SuiteProjects as the operational engine → PSA+ is the optimization layer on top of it.
Time & Expense, Project Billing, Resource Scheduling, Predictive + AI, Reports & Dashboards, Advanced analytics + forecasting, Revenue Forecasting, Predictive + scenario modeling, Margin Analysis, Real-time margin engine, Project Health Scores, Manual dashboards, Predictive scoring, Change Order Management, Automated workflows, Cost-to-Complete, Manual formulas, Automated & predictive, Integrations, Standard API, Enhanced objects + PSA data model, Obfuscated script, Contract Research Organization (CRO), Clinical trial operations, Clinical data management, Regulatory compliance & submissions, FDA / EMA compliance, GxP / cGMP / GCP environments, Quality management (QMS), Medical device lifecycle management, Pharmaceutical supply chain, Study planning and execution, Clinical documentation controls, Validation & audit readiness, ISO 13485, 21 CFR, Part 11 compliance, Pharmacovigilance workflows, Lab operations (LIMS), Product traceability & serialization, CDMO, NetSuite for Life Sciences, NetSuite for CRO operations, NetSuite Manufacturing (medical devices / pharma), NetSuite Quality Management module, NetSuite Supply Chain & Inventory (serialized / lot controlled), NetSuite Advanced Manufacturing, WMS for controlled environments, Integrations (LIMS, QMS, eQMS, PLM), Audit & Compliance automation, clinical project accounting, NetSuite PSA for clinical projects, revenue recognition (ASC 606 for CRO contracts), procurement for regulated industries, workflows for regulated documentation, CSV import controls / validation processes, SOX-compliant architecture, Contract Development and Manufacturing Organization (CDMO)

experience.position: NetSuite Business Architect - Advanced Revenue Management SuiteBilling Multi-Book OpenAir PSA Pro
experience.description:
Senior NetSuite Architect with deep expertise in full life-cycle implementations, optimization, and SuiteScript/technical development. Extensive experience with Multi-Book Accounting, Advanced Revenue Management (ARM), SuiteBilling, OpenAir, and Professional Services Automation, including ERP data migration, cutover, and validation. Skilled in designing scalable data models, Oracle database architecture, ETL processes, ODBC/JDBC strategies, and REST/SOAP/SuiteTalk integrations. Adept in SuiteScript 1.0/2.0 for workflows, scheduled scripts, client and user event customizations, and automating complex finance, billing, revenue recognition, and operational processes.
Proven experience leading functional, integration, and regression testing, developing test plans, scenarios, and scripts to ensure successful NetSuite application validation. Strong understanding of ASC 606 revenue recognition, audit/SOX compliance, Coupa administration, configuration, and integrations, as well as NetSuite SuiteAnalytics and AI capabilities to enhance reporting, forecasting, and predictive business insights. Experienced in pre-sales solutioning, translating complex business requirements into scalable technical solutions, and leveraging ERP and data-driven insights to optimize business processes.
Frequently engaged by Big 4 and Top 10 firms for white-labeled delivery of high-complexity NetSuite initiatives, providing subject-matter expertise across GL, AP/AR, approvals, roles, reporting, inventory, procurement, and cross-module integrations. Hands-on experience with SDLC, JavaScript, object-oriented programming (OOP), SQL, real-time reporting, revenue lifecycle automation, and multi-system integration architectures to drive transformation, scalability, & operational efficiency across finance and operational functions. Software design, structures, attributes, methods, modular code, data schema, concepts, classes, abstraction, encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism, fluency in Spanish,

receivedRecommendations.givenBy: Angelina Autran, MBA, 6-Sigma Black Belt, FCXP
receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: A strong advocate for the people who use our digital products and solutions.
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 17, 2009, Angelina and Andrew studied together
receivedRecommendations.description:
I had the opportunity and pleasure to meet Andrew during our MBA program.  I must say he is the most passionate, driven and dedicated person I have ever met.  As a group, we strived and performed outstandingly, and I must add, it had a lot to do with his leadership and teamwork.
I highly recommend Andrew, as he would take any venture to the next level.
